alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued October 26 at 7:02AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH THURSDAY... WHAT...Flash flooding caused by heavy rain and thunderstorms are possible WHERE...All Islands of American Samoa WHEN...Through Thursday IMPACTS...Heavy rainfall may cause flooding on roadways and properties and overflowing of streams. ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The active trough over the Islands will bring heavy showers and thunderstorms for the territory. This will keep the potential for flash flooding through Thursday. Nofo Va`ava`aia mo Tafega ma Lologa Ofisa o le Tau Pago Pago AS 655 Taeao Aso Lulu Oketopa 26 2022 ...UA IAI LE NOFO VA`AVA`AIA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA E OO I LE ASO TOFI... MAFUAAGA...O lologa ma tafega o le a mafua mai i timuga ma faititili o lo`o gasolo mai. NOFOAGA...Motu uma o Amerika Samoa TAIMI...Se`ia oo i le Aso Tofi. AAFIAGA...O le tetele o timuga ma faititili e ono mafua ai lologa ma tafega i luga o aualatele ma nofoaga a`afia gofie, fa`apea auvai pa pa. FA`AMATALAGA FA`AOPOOPO...O uiga louloua o le tau o loo i luga o le atunu`u o le a mafua ai timuga mamafa ma faititili e ono aafia ai le atusamoa. O nei timuga mamafa o le a ono tutupu mai ai lologa ma tafega i luga o le atunuu e oo atu i le Aso Tofi. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O le uiga o le nofo vaavaaia mo tafega ma lologa, o le ono faatupula`ia lea o le tetele o timuga, tafega ma lologa, fa`apea sologa mai i mauga po o eleelee, ona o uiga louloua o le tau. E tatau ona tapena ma faalogologo i le leitio mo tala o le tau, ae maise pe a iai se faailo mo se lapataiga mo tafega ma lologa.
info.instruction: A flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
